DataElement.preferredName: Person Substance of Abuse Begin Age Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Questions asking the respondent How old were you when you FIRST used a drug category. [Manually curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Substance of Abuse Begin Age
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Questions asking the respondent how many day in the past 30 days s/he used an illicit substance. [Manually curated]

Property.preferredDefinition: Any substance, including any illegal, prescription, over-the-counter agent or any other compound, used for the purpose other than indicated or used in quantities other than directed. Substances from various drug classes can be abused, such as opioids, amphetamines, analgesics, benzodiazepines, barbiturates, hallucinogens, steroids, tobacco products and alcoholic substances. A substance of abuse may act on the central nervous system (CNS) or can have an effect in other parts of the body and can lead to physical and/or physiological dependence.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.

Concepts.definition: Any substance, including any illegal, prescription, over-the-counter agent or any other compound, used for the purpose other than indicated or used in quantities other than directed. Substances from various drug classes can be abused, such as opioids, amphetamines, analgesics, benzodiazepines, barbiturates, hallucinogens, steroids, tobacco products and alcoholic substances. A substance of abuse may act on the central nervous system (CNS) or can have an effect in other parts of the body and can lead to physical and/or physiological dependence.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured, assigned or computed to describe an individual's age.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
